name: Workfloor out of control
description:
Hello! My name is Job, I am a 17 years old game enthusiast from the Netherlands and would love to become a game dev. This is my first semi-finished game and I loved making it. I know it is far from perfect but I would love to hear any feedback and hope that you had at least a little bit of fun playing it!

The game is meant to take place in an office where the workers are getting out of control, they keep throwing bits of paper all around the room. Your job is to finish your work by managing their behaviour and keep focus on your work.
